changeSet.createView: select item.identifier as identifier, item.specimen_id as specimen_id, item.quantity as quantity, item.status as status, item.return_quantity as return_quantity, item.return_container_id as return_container_id, item.return_container_row as return_container_row, item.return_container_column as return_container_column, item.return_user_id as return_user_id, item.return_date as return_date, item.return_comments as return_comments, ord.name as name, ord.requester_id as requester_id, ord.distributor_id as distributor_id, ord.execution_date as execution_date, ord.comments as comments, dp.short_title as dp_short_title from os_order_items item inner join os_orders ord on item.order_id = ord.identifier inner join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on ord.distribution_protocol_id = dp.identifier where ord.status != 'PENDING'
